about_the_game:
Misaki (Chloe) and April (Jessie) met in Isekai Online and have been playing together for quite some time. They both love the game and dream of being the best at it. But everyone has a different idea on how to be the best, and so disagreements prevent them from progressing. The situation only gets worse once they discover that in real life they are colleagues at work!

Help the main characters to sort themselves out and build rapport both in the game and in real life.

Name: Chloe

Nickname: Misaki

Favorite character: Necromancer

The protagonist of the story. Chloe doesn't have exceptional talent, but she achieves everything with diligence. She gets really annoyed when someone does something wrong. Because of this, it is difficult for her to find common ground with anyone, not only in the game, but also in real life.

Chloe tries to seem strong, but in fact she is a very fragile person, constantly doubting the correctness of her decisions.

Name: Jessie

Nickname: April

Favorite character: Reaper

Jessie is the exact opposite of Chloe; she is able to play at a high level without putting in much effort. She doesn't like her friend's overly serious approach to many things, especially in Isekai Online since she looks at the game in a fun light.

Cheerful and sociable. Prefers to ignore problems rather than solve them.

Duration: ~1 hour

Features:

  • Story about a strong female friendship, work, and mobile games

  • Visual Novel with choices

  • High-quality anime-style graphics

  • Screen resolution Full HD 1080p

content_descriptors.notes: Office Girls and Games contains strong language, alcohol and revealing outfits.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: 1 Gz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Office Girls and Games

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/10 (32 bit or 64 bit)
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/10 (32 bit or 64 bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Linguagem imprópria
Conteúdo sexual
Drogas lícitas

short_description: In this Visual Novel, you'll join Chloe and Jessie in the popular mobile game, Isekai Online. Eliminate arguments and disagreements in this strange duo and lead them to victory!
